metadata.title: CVE-2024-26677 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: rxrpc:Fix delayed ACKs to not set the reference serial number Fix theconstruction of delayed ACKs to not set the reference serial number as theycan't be used as an RTT reference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
